item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Details
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Details Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Details data type contains information relating to a server’s component information, network information, and software information. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware::getObject Local components The components that belong to a piece of hardware. Type: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component[] networkComponents The network components that belong to a piece of hardware. Type: SoftLayer_Network_Component[] software The software that belong to a piece of hardware.
